lines.text: I think sexual intercourse is in order, Gilbert.
In Westminster Abbey tomorrow morning, a young couple are getting married of a purity and a nobility scum like you just can't comprehend.
I want a future that lives up to my past.
Now, under this National Health Service, any poorly little pillock can come into my surgery and say "I'm ill! Treat me!" Honestly, sometimes I wonder what the last war was FOR.
My experience has been, Mrs Forbes, that when people say they are only human, it's because they have been making beasts of themselves.
I can put my hands on two turkeys in Bradford.
Two? TWO? We've got a hundred and fifty people coming! And Jesus isn't one of them!

[upon spotting a single, solitary banana]
Mrs Medcalf, are you wanting that banana?
I am, love; I'm planning a trifle.
It's not pork, Gilbert, it's power!
